com.fortify.pub.bugtracker.plugin

Interface ChangesetDiscoveryPlugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBugTrackerAndChangesetDiscoveryPlugin
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface ChangesetDiscoveryPlugin

    • Method Summary

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> queryChangesetsBetween(java.lang.String greaterThanRevision, java.lang.String lesserThanOrEqualToRevision, java.lang.String touchingFilePath, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> bugParams, UserAuthenticationStore credentials)
      Deprecated. 
      Instead of implementing this interface, plugin can calculate it before filing the bug using fields in BugSubmission.getIssueDetail(), namely getLastBuildWithoutIssue(), getDetectedInBuild() and getFileName()

    • Method Detail

      • queryChangesetsBetween

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> queryChangesetsBetween(java.lang.String greaterThanRevision,
                                                        java.lang.String lesserThanOrEqualToRevision,
                                                        java.lang.String touchingFilePath,
                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> bugParams,
                                                        UserAuthenticationStore credentials)
        Deprecated. Instead of implementing this interface, plugin can calculate it before filing the bug using fields in BugSubmission.getIssueDetail(), namely getLastBuildWithoutIssue(), getDetectedInBuild() and getFileName()
        Query changesets from a version control repository that touch a file between indicated revisions

        This method is invoked by SSC to obtain possible version control revision identifiers an issue was possibly introduced in.

        Consider this example where S0 to S8 represent scans, and the x positions represent scans where the issue was found, and R0 to R8 represent the snapshot revision numbers/identifiers from version control repository for which the scan was conducted. 

         

 R0----R1----R2----R3----R4----R5----R6----R7----R8
 S0----S1----S2----S3----S4----S5----S6----S7----S8
 x-----x-----------------x-----x-----------x-----x

        In this example, SSC infers that S6 was the last scan that did not have the issue. So this method is used to query all changesets that occurred between revisions R6 and R7 that touched the file containing the issue.

        Parameters:
        bugParams - per-bug user input provided by user for the issue
        greaterThanRevision - the method should query for changesets that touched the file AFTER this specific revision. Note that the result should not include this revision
        lesserThanOrEqualToRevision - the method should query for changesets that touched the file before or on this specific revision
        touchingFilePath - suffix of the path to the file that has the issue
        credentials - bug tracker system credentials to use
        Returns:
        the identifiers of labels/builds/revisions that touched the file between the two revisions indicated
        Throws:
        BugTrackerException - for all errors that are to be relayed to the user
        BugTrackerAuthenticationException - if there is an error authenticating to the bug tracking system
